hero.title: Control Your Devices
hero.description: MaaAI is an intelligent AI agent that understands your commands and automates Windows and Android device operations. Just describe what you want to do.

features.title: Powerful Capabilities
features.description: Built on the Model Context Protocol, MaaAI provides seamless device control through intelligent automation.

naturalLanguage.title: Natural Language Control
naturalLanguage.description: Simply describe what you want to do. MaaAI understands your intent and executes complex operations automatically.

windows.title: Windows Automation
windows.description: Control desktop applications, manage files, automate workflows, and interact with any Windows software.

android.title: Android Control
android.description: Automate mobile apps, perform UI interactions, and manage Android devices remotely with ease.

recognition.title: Intelligent Recognition
recognition.description: Advanced screen recognition and understanding. MaaAI sees and comprehends your device interface.

demo.title: Try It Yourself
demo.description: See how natural language commands translate to device actions.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.description: MaaAI leverages the Model Context Protocol to bridge AI understanding with device control.

step1.title: Describe Your Intent
step1.description: Use natural language to describe what you want to accomplish on your device.

step2.title: AI Understands
step2.description: MaaAI analyzes your command, recognizes the screen, and plans the execution steps.

step3.title: Automated Execution
step3.description: The agent performs the actions on your Windows or Android device automatically.

cta.title: Ready to Get Started?
cta.description: MaaAI is open source and built on the MCP protocol. Join our community and start automating your devices today.
